interpretation:
The "SOON arrow" card represents a sense of urgency and anticipation. This card indicates that something is about to happen, and it is important to be prepared for it. It may also suggest that you need to act quickly and decisively to take advantage of an opportunity that will soon present itself. This card encourages you to be mindful of time, to prioritize your tasks, and to focus on what is most important. 

The "SOON arrow" card reminds you that haste makes waste, so it is important to take the time to prepare and plan properly. This card may also indicate that you are feeling impatient or restless and need to be mindful of your impulses. Take a deep breath, stay calm, and trust that everything will happen in its own time. 

In summary, the "SOON arrow" card is a call to action, reminding you to be alert, focused, and prepared for what's coming. It encourages you to stay motivated and to take advantage of opportunities when they arise. However, it also cautions you to be patient and to trust the timing of the universe.
